contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox islands | name = Malta | image name = Only Malta Island map.png | image caption = Map of Malta Island | image size = | locator map = Malta-Malta.svg | map caption = The island of Malta (dark green) in relation to the rest of [[Malta]] | native name = | native name link = | nickname = | location = south of [[Sicily]], [[Mediterranean Sea]] | coordinates = | archipelago = [[Malta#Islands|Maltese islands]] | total islands = | major islands = | area_km2 = 246 | coastline_km = 197 | highest mount = [[Ta'Dmejrek]] | elevation_m = 253 | country = Malta | country capital city = [[Valletta]] | country largest city = [[Birkirkara]] | country largest city population = | country leader title = | country leader name = | population = 388,232 | population as of = 2007 | density_km2 = 1578.18 | ethnic groups = [[Maltese people]] | additional info = }} The '''island of Malta''' is the largest of the three major islands that constitute the [[Malta|Maltese]] archipelago. Malta is in the middle of the [[Mediterranean Sea]] directly south of [[Italy]] and north of [[Libya]]. The area is [[1 E8 m²|246 km²]] (95 square miles). The capital is [[Valletta]], largest city is [[Qormi]] and the largest locality is [[Birkirkara]]. The island is made up of many small towns, which together form one [[Larger Urban Zones|Larger Urban Zone]] with a population of 452,515 (the majority of the population of the country) according to [[Eurostat]].<ref>[http://www.urbanaudit.org/DataAccessed.aspx Malta] ([http://www.urbanaudit.org/DataAccessedCSV.aspx?MultiIndicators=1&MultiCities=34&Groups=2&Years=5&JurisdictionLevels=3&lbOrder=1 CSV File]) – [[Eurostat]]</ref> The landscape is characterised by low hills with terraced fields. == Notes == {{reflist}} == See also == {{Portal|Malta|Islands}} * [[Malta]] (country) * [[Geography of Malta]] * [[Gozo]] * [[Comino]] [[File:Valletta.jpg|thumb|left|[[Valletta]]]] {{Malta Islands}} {{coord|35|53|N|14|27|E|type:isle|display=title}} [[Category:Islands of Malta]] {{Malta-geo-stub}}
